summary: Hyperscalers are aggressively increasing AI infrastructure investments with Microsoft projecting 15% Capex growth, Google prioritizing AI infrastructure, Meta raising 2024 Capex guidance to $35-40B, and AWS planning substantial YoY growth. GPU rental prices remain stable at $3.18/hr, indicating sustained demand. GPT-5 (mid-2025) and Gemini 2 developments further signal industry momentum.
